title: Elementalist Glitc

embed.description: Watch flyinglemonade's League of Legends video: Fire+Fire=???? - Plays.tv

body:
{{champion:99}} 

in this video, you'll see that I'm already fire. Then, I click fire for the second upgrade, but the outcome is the basic nature path. If you look at the little animation where the elements combine, it looks like fire is combining with nature. But, even with that, I shouldn't turn into the basic nature. Thank you for reviewing this!!!

replies.body:
Hey! 

I appreciate the report! We've tackled this issue, and you should see a fix for it in 7.13. :)
